apihelp-cxpublish-summary: Save a page created using the Content Translation extension.
apihelp-cxpublish-param-title: The title of the page to perform actions on.
apihelp-cxpublish-param-sourcetitle: The title of the source page.
apihelp-cxpublish-param-categories: The categories to put the published page in.
apihelp-cxpublish-param-publishtags: The edit tags to add to the published page.
apihelp-cxpublish-param-wpCaptchaId: Captcha ID (when saving with a captcha response).
apihelp-cxpublish-param-wpCaptchaWord: Answer to the captcha (when saving with a captcha response).
apihelp-cxpublish-param-cxversion: Version of the editor used to publish the translation.
apihelp-query+contenttranslation-summary: Query Content Translation database for translations.
apihelp-query+contenttranslation-param-s: The title of the source page.
The title of the source section (optional).
apihelp-query+contenttranslation-param-l: The maximum number of translations to fetch.
apihelp-query+contenttranslation-param-u: The usecase for which the translations are being fetched (optional).
apihelp-query+contenttranslation-example: Get translations started by the current user.
Find any translation for the given title between given language pair
apihelp-query+contenttranslationcorpora-: Get the section-aligned parallel text for a given translation. See also list=cxpublishedtranslations. Dumps are provided in different formats for high volume access.
Whether to strip all HTML tags to return plaintext.
By default you will get all three of following if available: source text, machine translation and the postedited translation by the user. This parameter allows you not return some of these types.
apihelp-query+contenttranslationstats-ex: Get Content Translation statistics for all languages.
apihelp-query+contenttranslationsuggesti: Get suggestion lists for Content Translation.
Return suggestions only from a particular list
The maximum number of translation suggestions to fetch.
By default suggestions are returned in random order. If you wish to return each suggestion only once when using limit and offset, you must specify a seed for all the requests.
Fetch pages suggested for translation from English (en) to Spanish (es).
apihelp-query+cxpublishedtranslations-pa: The maximum number of translations to fetch.
apihelp-query+cxpublishedtranslations-ex: Fetch all published translations, translated from English
Fetch all published translations, translated from English to Spanish
apihelp-query+contenttranslationlangtren: Query Content Translation database for numbers of translations by period of time.
The interval for calculating the trend. Can be <kbd>week</kbd> or <kbd>month</kbd>.
Fetch the publishing trend for the language pair es-ca with weekly intervals
Fetch the publishing trend for all languages
apihelp-cxtoken-summary: Get JWT tokens to authenticate with cxserver.
apihelp-cxtoken-example-1: Fetch the authentication token for cxserver
apihelp-cxdelete-summary: Delete a draft translation created using the Content Translation extension.
apihelp-cxdelete-param-sourcetitle: The title of the source page.
apihelp-cxdelete-example-1: Delete a draft associated with given language pair and title.
apihelp-cxsuggestionlist-example-1: Add a title to a list as a suggestion to translate from English (en) to Spanish (es). If the list does not exist already, a new list will be created.
apihelp-cxsuggestionlist-summary: Manage the suggestion lists. Add suggestions to lists and remove them.
apihelp-cxsuggestionlist-param-listactio: Action to be performed on the list.
apihelp-query+cxtranslatorstats-summary: Fetch the translation statistics for the given user.
apihelp-query+cxtranslatorstats-param-tr: The translator's username. This parameter is optional. If not passed, the currently logged-in user will be used.
apihelp-query+cxtranslatorstats-example-: Fetch the translation statistics for the given user.
apihelp-cxsave-summary: This module allows to save draft translations by section to save bandwidth and to collect parallel corpora.
apihelp-cxsave-param-sourcerevision: The revision of the source page.
apihelp-cxsave-param-progress: Information about translation completion (progress). JSON with the keys any, human, mt and mtSectionsCount. The keys' values are percentages.
apihelp-cxsave-param-content: JSON-encoded section data. Each section is an object and has the following keys: content, sectionId, sequenceId, sequenceId, origin
apihelp-cxsave-param-title: The title of the page to perform actions on.
apihelp-cxsave-param-sourcetitle: The title of the source page.
apihelp-cxsave-param-cxversion: Version of the editor used to create the draft translation.
apihelp-cxsave-param-sourcecategories: JSON encoded array of source categories to be saved with draft translation.
apihelp-cxsave-param-targetcategories: JSON encoded array of target categories to be saved with draft translation.
apierror-cx-inuse: Another user is already translating this article.
apierror-cx-invalidsourcecategories: Invalid JSON encoded array of source categories.
apierror-cx-invalidtargetcategories: Invalid JSON encoded array of target categories.
apierror-cx-mustbeloggedin-suggestions: You must be logged-in to manage your suggestions.
apierror-cx-mustbeloggedin-get-suggestio: You must be logged-in to get translation suggestions.
apierror-cx-mustbeloggedin-viewtranslati: To view your translations, you must log in.
apierror-cx-invalid-type-viewtranslation: Invalid translation type. Type must be set and must be either 'deleted', 'draft' or 'published'
apierror-cx-samelanguages: Source and target languages cannot be the same.
apierror-cx-suggestionsdisabled: Suggestions not enabled for this wiki.
apihelp-query+langlinkscount-summary: Get the number of other language versions.
apihelp-query+langlinkscount-example-1: Get the number of other language versions for 'Dog' page
apihelp-query+cxdeletedtranslations-summ: Get the number of your published translations that were deleted.
apihelp-query+cxdeletedtranslations-para: Timestamp to get only newer deletions.
Namespace in which the deleted translations were published. Defaults to the main namespace.
apihelp-query+cxdeletedtranslations-exam: Get the number of your deleted translations, which were published to main namespace and deleted after 2019-04-07 16:24:44
apihelp-cxpublishsection-summary: Save a section created using the Content Translation extension's section translation feature.
apihelp-cxpublishsection-param-title: The title of the page to perform actions on.
apihelp-cxpublishsection-param-sourcetit: The title of the source page.
apihelp-cxpublishsection-param-sourcesec: The title of the source section.
apihelp-cxpublishsection-param-targetsec: The title of the target section.
apihelp-cxpublishsection-param-sectionnu: The position of section to be in the new revision of page.
apihelp-cxpublishsection-param-captchaid: Captcha ID (when saving with a captcha response).
apihelp-cxpublishsection-param-captchawo: Answer to the captcha (when saving with a captcha response).
apihelp-cxpublishsection-param-sectiontr: The section translation id associated with the draft section translation.
apihelp-cxpublishsection-param-issandbox: Use a sandbox title for translation.
apihelp-sxsave-summary: Save the draft section translation and store the parallel corpora
apihelp-sxsave-param-sourcetitle: The title of the source page.
apihelp-sxsave-param-targettitle: The title of the target page.
apihelp-sxsave-param-content: JSON-encoded section data. Each section is an object and has the following keys: content, sectionId, origin, validate
apihelp-sxsave-param-sourcesectiontitle: The title of the source section.
apihelp-sxsave-param-targetsectiontitle: The title of the target section.
apihelp-sxsave-param-sectionnumber: The position of section to be in the new revision of page.
apihelp-sxsave-param-issandbox: Use a sandbox title for translation.
apierror-sxsave-anon-user: "sxsave" API action is not enabled for anonymous users
apihelp-sxdelete-summary: Delete the draft section translation and its parallel corpora from database.
apihelp-sxdelete-param-sectiontranslatio: The section translation id associated with the draft section translation.
apihelp-sxdelete-param-translationid: The translation id associated with the draft section translation.
apihelp-sxdelete-param-sectionid: The id of the section of the draft section translation.
apihelp-sxdelete-example-1: Delete a draft associated with given translation id and section id.
apihelp-cxsplit-summary: Create and save a section translation to database, for every translated section of the given article translation
apihelp-cxsplit-param-translationid: The id of the translation, for which the section translations will be created.
apierror-cxsplit-anon-user: "cxsplit" API action is not enabled for anonymous users
apierror-cxsplit-no-translation-found: No translation found for the given id
apihelp-cxcheckunreviewed-summary: Check if any fast, unreviewed translation has been published recently for the current user.
apierror-cxcheckunreviewed-anon-user: "cxcheckunreviewed" API action is not enabled for anonymous users
apihelp-query+automatictranslationdensel: Fetch the list of sitelinks for the article that corresponds to a given Wikidata ID, ordered by article size.
A boolean value indicating whether the section titles should be included in the response.
Fetch the list of sitelinks for the 'Moon' article in all available languages, sorted by article size.
Fetch the list of sitelinks for the 'Moon' article, including the section titles, in all available languages, sorted by article size.
apierror-query+automatictranslationdense: Request to fetch sitelinks from Wikidata failed
apihelp-query+automatictranslationdensel: The maximum number of sitelinks to fetch.
